definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Crowds of people flow to Lieshi Park.
sentences.chinese: 烈士公園裏到處是傳流不息的人潮。

sentences.english: Proving his beauty by succession thine!
sentences.chinese: 就證明你的美顏能夠繼承傳流。
